text: Song Sun-ho (; born 24 January 1966) is a South Korean former footballer and current manager of Bucheon FC. He played as defender. ==Career== He was appointed as an interim manager of Bucheon FC on 29 May 2015. He was promoted to full-time manager on 3 October 2015. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:South Korean footballers Category:South Korean football managers Category:Jeju United FC players Category:K League 1 players Category:Bucheon FC 1995 managers Category:Asan Mugunghwa FC managers
title: Song Sun-ho
